CustomField.description: Salesforce API name of a field, present on source object, which should be used as identifier for data mapping process completion. This field will be updated by batch job as to denote record mapping is done for source record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Salesforce API name of a field, present on source object, which should be used as identifier for data mapping process completion. This field will be updated by batch job as to denote record mapping is done for source record.
CustomField.label: Process Completion Identifier Field
